entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning early this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
